attributes.action: intervene and stop any closures to rural post offices in Lincolnshire which provide a valuable service to the local community where public transport is non existent.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The old and the disabled in Lincolnshire NEED their rural post office cum village store as they provide a meeting place for local residents and a point of contact for information and are a valuable source of employment.
